title: 104_hr511
content: Workforce Preparation and Development Act - Declares the intent of the Congress to provide for the establishment of a comprehensive and consolidated workforce preparation and development system in the United States. Declares that, by the end of the 104th Congress, the Congress shall: (1) conduct a thorough evaluation of all Federal workforce preparation and development programs to determine their quality, effectiveness, and efficiency. (2) enact legislation that provides for a comprehensive and consolidated workforce preparation and development system, with specified features. And (3) repeal specified existing Federal workforce preparation and development programs, as appropriate.
